DOC.brief_summary: The HEMO-TIN trial design look safety ( bleed risk ) effectiveness ( clot risk ) tinzaparin compare unfractionated heparin anticoagulation hemodialysis patient .
DOC.criteria: Age > = 18 year End stage renal disease maintain outpatient hemodialysis > = 3 month Frequency hemodialysis : 3 time per week Anticoagulation unfractionated heparin protocol least 4 week Patient legal guardian able provide write consent Baseline INR < = 1.3 Baseline platelet count > = 80,000 x 10^9/L Therapeutic systemic anticoagulation Clinically apparent bleeding last 2 month High risk bleeding Planned major surgery next 4 month Major surgery past 48 hour Pregnant lactate Child bear potential Allergy/intolerance heparin history heparin induce thrombocytopenia Current participation relate randomized drug trial
